column4: I have made source.list entries which go like this: "deb bla jaunty main" and I need one specific package from the source, how do I write the apt-get install command so it recognizes these lines (I'm obviously not running jaunty and I think that's why it ignores them)
sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install someprogram
be *sure* to remove that line when you finish and run apt-get update again, you can get yourself in a lot of trouble
ActionParsnip , n8tuser, apt-get update says Ign http://ppa.launchpad.net jaunty/main Packages, why is it ignored?
if you just need one package, open the repo url in firefox and download the package
